1: <pb/><t>¿Tzet wal yuj xan chi weklab eb conoblak? ¿Tzet wal yuj xan chi lajtinej eb tzet yetal tol c'am bak'in ok yunej?</t>
2: <t>A eb cham rey c'al eb yajawil conoblak chi caktzaj eb, cax chi wajban oc ba. Junlajan chi yun lajtinen ba eb yin Cham Jehová, c'al yin Cham Rey Sic'bil El Yuj.</t>
3: <t>Cax chi el yaw eb: Ok jican el co ba yul k'ab Cham. Ok co col co ba bay is yikbej, ẍi eb.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Axa Cham Yajaw bay satcan toc'al chi tzewi, cax chi buchlay eb yuj.</t>
5: <t>Yin aymanil ok yun tit yowal Cham, cax ok xibtelay eb yuj; yin wal yowal c'ul Cham, cax ok yalon bay eb:</t>
6: <t>Mayal wacan oc yopiso jun rey bay tzalan Sión, bay chi oc ayilal ayin, ẍi Cham.</t>
7: <pb/><t>Axa C'ajol Cham chi aloni: Ok walcan el tzet yetal max na' Cham Jehová. Max yal Cham ayin: Achton in C'ajol ach. Ayin max ach wak' iquisbok tinani'.</t>
8: <t>K'an ayin tinani' cax ok wak'on a sataknej mimek conoblak, cax chi occan masanil yulyibank'inal ti' yul a k'ab.</t>
9: <t>Ok ach yajawbok yiban eb yin c'am mimanc'ulalil, ok ak' lajwok eb axca chi yun pojtok junok tx'otx' xij yuj junok ch'en k'okoch, ẍi Cham ayin, ẍi Cham C'ajolej tu'.</t>
10: <pb/><t>A tinani' xin, ex reyal conob, jelanokab che yut e ba, c'al ex yajawil nacionlak, chi cam wal e yaben tzet chi wala'.</t>
11: <t>Ak'ek ayilal bay Jehová yin tzalojc'ulalil, ayokab yelapnok Cham yul e sat.</t>
12: <t>Ayanek nojan bay Cham C'ajolej yin xiwc'ulalil, a talaj chi tit yowal Cham, cax mi wal chex cami, yujtol yin aymanil chi tit yowal Cham. <pb/>Tzalojc'ulal yet masanil eb chi col ba yin Cham.</t>
